title: Adaptive Hypermedia System-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Simulation Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in college-level basic mathematics and practical application experience
context.additional_context: Emphasis on customized mathematical modeling training for solving practical problems.

learning_goals: Learners can solve practical mathematics problems in an AHS-based simulation environment with 85% accuracy.
Through social constructivist activities with peers, learners can generate three or more alternative approaches to complex mathematical models.
Learners can design personalized learning pathways that reduce individual learning gaps by 50% or more through system recommendations.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
